• Adaptive layout for all iOS devices

• Check-in
⁃ Logged into TrueBlue? Seamlessly add your TrueBlue number during check in
⁃ Updated international check-in fields for clarity
⁃ Booking flights on iPad now has a streamlined payment page - go from inspiration to vacation quick as ever
• Various bug fixes
• This update is 100% clown free

• Fixed TrueBlue photo edit bug
• Still 100% clown free
We fixed various bugs. That has nothing to do with centipedes. Just trust us on this one.
Various bug fixes
Cooked up a fix for a bug that was causing crashes when signing into TrueBlue.
Various bug fixes
Various bug fixes

• Check in for your flight directly from the home screen.
• Connect your TrueBlue and Lyft accounts directly from the app—all the better to earn TrueBlue points for your Lyft airport rides.
• Easier access to all sorts of useful travel tools from the home screen.
• Tweaks the ratio of Jet to Blue by 5%.

• We’ve updated “book a flight” for a smoother experience
• Various other bug fixes and enhancements
• This app enjoys long walks on the beach

• You can now retrieve boarding passes for lap infants.
• You and this update are about to live app-ily ever after.
• Various updates

• JetBlue is available on chat! You can now connect with a JetBlue crewmember through our in-app chat for assistance—tap ‘More’, then ‘Help’ to get started.
• Blink if this is your favorite app.
• Various updates
• Various updates

• You can now reach a JetBlue crewmember by text—tap ‘More’, then ‘Help’ to get started.
• Searching for flights is even easier with access to your recent searches on the ‘Book’ tab.
• You can now change your preferred temperature unit from Fahrenheit to Celsius in Settings.
• Continued design refresh.
• Here’s our update, so text us maybe!

• You can now reach a JetBlue crewmember by text—tap ‘More’, then ‘Help’ to get started.
• Searching for flights is even easier with access to your recent searches on the ‘Book’ tab.
• You can now change your preferred temperature unit from Fahrenheit to Celsius in Settings.
• Continued design refresh.

• You can print bag tags touch-free by scanning your mobile boarding pass at a kiosk (available at most airports).
• You can now explore all our onboard offerings in one place by tapping "More" then “Inflight".
• You can find easy access to up-to-date safety measures from the home view.

• You can now easily view your Travel Bank balance (if you have one) on the Home Screen or your TrueBlue profile when you’re signed in
• Various updates

• You can now easily view your Travel Bank balance (if you have one) on the Home Screen or your TrueBlue profile when you’re signed in
• Various updates

• You can now get notifications for sales, offers & promos.
• You can now enter promo codes when booking on the app during sales.
• Various updates.

• You can now get notifications for sales, offers & promos.
• You can now enter promo codes when booking on the app during sales.
• Various updates.

• You can now get notifications for sales, offers & promos.
• You can now enter promo codes when booking on the app during sales.
• Various updates.

• You can now easily access all the features on your TrueBlue profile from the app.
• Want to book flights further out? We now extend our flight schedule by a day—each and every day.
• Navigate your day of travel using interactive maps for four additional airports: FLL, LAX, SJU & BOS.
• Improved dynamic text sizes.
• Various bug fixes.

• If you're signed in when adding a new trip, your last name will automatically populate.
• Chat is in the hangar for enhancements, and is temporarily unavailable.
• Various updates.

• If you're signed in when adding a new trip, your last name will automatically populate.
• Chat is in the hangar for enhancements, and is temporarily unavailable.
• Various updates.

• You can now view trips from the past year associated with your TrueBlue account.
• Improvements to the My Trips experience for cancelled or changed trips.
• Accessibility improvements for screen readers.
• Various updates.

• Experience the app you love on your iPhone now on your iPad too.
• Add bags in check-in faster—and see them in your upcoming trip details.­
• This app doesn't mind if you keep your camera off during video chats.
